title: How much longer will Eminem realistically make good music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Until he’s the only person in the nursing home flirting. Pinching nurses’ asses while he’s jerkin’ off with Jergens. And he's jerkin’ but his whole bag of Viagra isn't workin’. And every single person is a Slim Shady lurkin’ who could be workin’ at Burger King, spittin on your onion rings.
